<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Furious Vengeance](/Feats.aspx?ID=5870) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 84 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[fury instinct](/Instincts.aspx?ID=10)

**Trigger**
An enemy within your melee reach critically hits you with a melee [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306).

</column>

---

Your enemy's blow fuels your rage and provokes your immediate retaliation. Make a melee Strike against the triggering enemy.
name: Furious Vengeance
